mockups.content:
# Basic App UI/UX Mockups

Based on the masterplan provided, I'll create UI/UX mockups for the main screens of the Basic App. Since the app's specific purpose is undefined, I'll design a flexible, minimalist interface that can be adapted to various use cases while following the principles of simplicity and usability mentioned in the masterplan.

## 1. Welcome/Onboarding Screen

**Purpose:** This screen introduces users to the app and provides a starting point for navigation. It incorporates a clean, intuitive design that can be customized once the app's purpose is defined.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- App Logo Placeholder -->
  <circle cx="180" cy="200" r="80" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.9"/>
  <text x="180" y="215" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">LOGO</text>
  
  <!-- Welcome Text -->
  <text x="180" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="28" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Welcome to Basic App</text>
  <text x="180" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Your starting point for something great</text>
  
  <!-- Get Started Button -->
  <rect x="80" y="420" width="200" height="50" rx="25" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="180" y="452" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Get Started</text>
  
  <!-- Sign In Link -->
  <text x="180" y="500" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">Already have an account? Sign in</text>
  
  <!-- Version Number -->
  <text x="180" y="620" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Version 1.0.0</text>
</svg>
```

## 2. Home Screen / Dashboard

**Purpose:** This screen serves as the main interface after login, displaying key information and providing access to the app's primary functions. The design is modular to accommodate various content types once the app's purpose is defined.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#ffffff"/>
  <text x="20" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">9:41 AM</text>
  <text x="340" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333" text-anchor="end">100%</text>
  
  <!-- App Bar -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="20" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="white">Home</text>
  <circle cx="330" cy="52" r="18" fill="white" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="330" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">⚙️</text>
  
  <!-- Welcome Section -->
  <rect x="16" y="96" width="328" height="80" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="32" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Welcome, User</text>
  <text x="32" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666">What would you like to do today?</text>
  
  <!-- Feature Cards -->
  <rect x="16" y="192" width="156" height="120" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="94" cy="232" r="24" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="94" y="238" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">1</text>
  <text x="94" y="280" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature One</text>
  
  <rect x="188" y="192" width="156" height="120" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="266" cy="232" r="24" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="266" y="238" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">2</text>
  <text x="266" y="280" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature Two</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="328" width="156" height="120" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="94" cy="368" r="24" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="94" y="374" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">3</text>
  <text x="94" y="416" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature Three</text>
  
  <rect x="188" y="328" width="156" height="120" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="266" cy="368" r="24" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="266" y="374" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">4</text>
  <text x="266" y="416" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature Four</text>
  
  <!-- Recent Activity Section -->
  <text x="16" y="480" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Recent Activity</text>
  <rect x="16" y="490" width="328" height="1" fill="#eee"/>
  
  <rect x="16" y="500" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="32" y="530" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Activity Item 1</text>
  <text x="32" y="550" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999">Today, 10:30 AM</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="570" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="32" y="600" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Activity Item 2</text>
  <text x="32" y="620" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999">Yesterday, 3:45 PM</text>
  
  <!-- Bottom Navigation -->
  <rect y="640" width="360" height="60" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1" transform="translate(0, -60)"/>
  <circle cx="60" cy="610" r="20" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="60" y="615" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">Home</text>
  <circle cx="180" cy="610" r="20" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  <text x="180" y="615" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Search</text>
  <circle cx="300" cy="610" r="20" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  <text x="300" y="615" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Profile</text>
</svg>
```

## 3. Feature Detail Screen

**Purpose:** This screen demonstrates how a specific feature or content item would be displayed in detail. The layout is adaptable to various types of content while maintaining consistent navigation patterns.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#ffffff"/>
  <text x="20" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">9:41 AM</text>
  <text x="340" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333" text-anchor="end">100%</text>
  
  <!-- App Bar -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <circle cx="30" cy="52" r="18" fill="white" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="30" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">←</text>
  <text x="180" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Feature Detail</text>
  <circle cx="330" cy="52" r="18" fill="white" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="330" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">⋮</text>
  
  <!-- Feature Image/Icon -->
  <rect x="80" y="100" width="200" height="150" rx="8" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <circle cx="180" cy="175" r="40" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="180" y="185" font-family="Arial" font-size="30" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">1</text>
  
  <!-- Feature Title and Description -->
  <text x="180" y="280" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature One</text>
  <rect x="40" y="300" width="280" height="80" fill="transparent"/>
  <text x="180" y="320" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">This is a detailed description of Feature One.</text>
  <text x="180" y="345" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">It explains what the feature does and how</text>
  <text x="180" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">users can benefit from it.</text>
  
  <!-- Action Buttons -->
  <rect x="40" y="400" width="280" height="50" rx="25" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="180" y="432" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Primary Action</text>
  
  <rect x="40" y="470" width="280" height="50" rx="25" fill="white" stroke="#4a90e2" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="180" y="502" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">Secondary Action</text>
  
  <!-- Related Items -->
  <text x="40" y="550" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Related Items</text>
  
  <rect x="40" y="560" width="80" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="80" cy="590" r="15" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="80" y="595" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">2</text>
  
  <rect x="140" y="560" width="80" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="180" cy="590" r="15" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="180" y="595" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">3</text>
  
  <rect x="240" y="560" width="80" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="280" cy="590" r="15" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="280" y="595" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">4</text>
</svg>
```

## 4. Settings Screen

**Purpose:** This screen allows users to configure app preferences and access account-related functions. The design follows a standard settings pattern that can be customized based on the app's specific requirements.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#ffffff"/>
  <text x="20" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">9:41 AM</text>
  <text x="340" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333" text-anchor="end">100%</text>
  
  <!-- App Bar -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <circle cx="30" cy="52" r="18" fill="white" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="30" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">←</text>
  <text x="180" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Settings</text>
  
  <!-- Profile Section -->
  <rect x="16" y="96" width="328" height="100" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="66" cy="146" r="30" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.7"/>
  <text x="66" y="153" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">U</text>
  <text x="120" y="136" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">User Name</text>
  <text x="120" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666">user@example.com</text>
  <text x="320" y="146" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">›</text>
  
  <!-- Settings Sections -->
  <text x="16" y="220" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#999">ACCOUNT</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="230" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="56" y="265" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Personal Information</text>
  <text x="26" y="265" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2">👤</text>
  <text x="320" y="265" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">›</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="300" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="56" y="335" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Notifications</text>
  <text x="26" y="335" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2">🔔</text>
  <text x="320" y="335" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">›</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="370" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="56" y="405" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Privacy & Security</text>
  <text x="26" y="405" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2">🔒</text>
  <text x="320" y="405" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">›</text>
  
  <text x="16" y="460" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#999">PREFERENCES</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="470" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="56" y="505" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Appearance</text>
  <text x="26" y="505" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2">🎨</text>
  <text x="320" y="505" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">›</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="540" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="56" y="575" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Language</text>
  <text x="26" y="575" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2">🌐</text>
  <text x="300" y="575" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">English</text>
  <text x="320" y="575" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">›</text>
  
  <!-- Sign Out Button -->
  <rect x="80" y="620" width="200" height="50" rx="25" fill="#f44336"/>
  <text x="180" y="652" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Sign
